name: Paint Ball Thrower
description:
Welcome to Paint Ball Thrower

This game is made by Doosung Jang, 101175013

GAME3033, GameEngines4Unity, Midterm, Game Jam

Instruction

W,A,S,D : Move

Mouse : Rotate character

Mouse left : Fire bullet

P : Pause

1, 2, 3 : Change bullet

Use color relationship to defeat enemy and destroy wall. 

Find the goal placed somewhere in map.

Red can kill green.

Green can kill blue.

Blue can kill red.
